UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial and immunomodulatory activities of PR-39 derived peptides.
Literature.Author: Veldhuizen EJ, Schneider VA, Agustiandari H, van Dijk A, Tjeerdsma-van Bokhoven JL, Bikker FJ, Haagsman HP

Literature.Title: Anti-microbial activity and cell binding are controlled by sequence determinants in the anti-microbial peptide PR-39.
Literature.Author: Chan YR, Zanetti M, Gennaro R, Gallo RL

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=5µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=>40µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MBC=5µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MBC=>40µM),Escherichia coli ML-35(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli D21(MIC=0.5µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=0.125µM),Serratia marcescens ATCC 8100(MIC=4µM),Bacillus megaterium Bm11(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>64µM)
